name: Push-Up
description: A classic bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, triceps and core.
setup_instructions: Start in a high-plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
execution_steps: Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground, then push back up to full elbow extension.
safety_tips: Keep core tight, avoid sagging hips. Progress to knee push-ups if needed.
modifications: Knee push-ups, incline push-ups, weighted push-ups.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: Foundational lower-body strength exercise for quads, glutes and hamstrings.
setup_instructions: Rack bar at shoulder height, step under and place bar across upper back.
execution_steps: Unrack, step back, descend until thighs are at or below parallel, drive through heels to stand.
safety_tips: Maintain neutral spine and knees aligned with toes; use spotters or safety pins with heavy loads.
modifications: Goblet squat, box squat, paused squat.

name: Deadlift (Conventional)
description: Compound posterior-chain movement focusing on hamstrings, glutes and low back.
setup_instructions: Stand bar over midfoot, hands outside knees, chest up and hips hinged.
execution_steps: Drive through the feet, extend hips and knees, keep bar close until standing tall.
safety_tips: Avoid rounding the lower back; use appropriate weights and technique.
modifications: Romanian deadlift, sumo deadlift, trap-bar deadlift.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Primary horizontal pressing movement for chest, shoulders and triceps.
setup_instructions: Lie on bench, plant feet, retract shoulder blades, grip bar slightly wider than shoulder-width.
execution_steps: Lower with control to the chest, press up by driving through the chest and triceps.
safety_tips: Use spotter or safety arms with heavy loads; keep shoulders pinched and wrist neutral.
modifications: Dumbbell bench, incline/decline bench, close-grip bench.

name: Hip Thrust (Barbell)
description: Glute-dominant hip extension exercise for glute hypertrophy and hip drive.
setup_instructions: Sit with upper back on bench, bar over hips with pad; feet planted.
execution_steps: Drive hips up by squeezing the glutes until torso is parallel to floor.
safety_tips: Control the descent; keep chin tucked and brace core.
modifications: Glute bridge, single-leg hip thrust, banded variations.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: Dynamic explosive hip hinge movement that builds posterior chain power and conditioning.
setup_instructions: Stand over kettlebell with feet shoulder-width; hinge at hips to grab the handle.
execution_steps: Hinge hard at hips and explosively extend to swing bell to chest level or overhead (as programmed).
safety_tips: Use hip drive—not a squat; keep a neutral spine and strong brace.
modifications: Two-hand swing, single-arm swing, light hip hinge drills.

name: Overhead Press (Barbell)
description: Primary vertical pressing movement for shoulders and triceps.
setup_instructions: Stand with feet hip-width, grip bar at clavicle level with thumb around bar.
execution_steps: Press bar overhead in a straight path, lock out with ribs down and glutes tight.
safety_tips: Avoid leaning back excessively; use leg drive carefully if doing push-press.
modifications: Seated dumbbell press, push-press, landmine press.

name: Pull-Up (Strict)
description: Bodyweight pulling exercise that builds lats, upper back and biceps.
setup_instructions: Hang from bar with shoulders engaged and full scapular control.
execution_steps: Pull chest to bar with elbows driving down and back; lower with control.
safety_tips: Avoid kipping on strict sets; scale with band assistance if necessary.
modifications: Assisted band pull-ups, negatives, Australian rows.

name: Bent-Over Barbell Row
description: Horizontal pulling exercise for back thickness.
muscle_groups: Upper Back, Lats, Rear Delts, Biceps
setup_instructions: Hinge at hips with neutral spine, grip barbell and set scapula.
execution_steps: Row bar to lower chest/upper abs with elbows back, lower under control.
safety_tips: Keep core braced, avoid excessive torso swing.
modifications: Dumbbell row, chest-supported row, Pendlay row.

name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
description: Hamstring-dominant hinge for posterior chain development.
setup_instructions: Stand with slight bend; hold bar and hinge at hips while maintaining a neutral spine.
execution_steps: Lower bar along thighs to mid-shin while feeling stretch in hamstrings; return by driving hips forward.
safety_tips: Lead with hips, not back; keep slight knee bend.
modifications: Single-leg RDL, dumbbell RDL.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: Single-leg quad/glute builder that improves balance and unilateral strength.
setup_instructions: Stand lunge stance with rear foot elevated on bench or box.
execution_steps: Descend until front thigh is about parallel, then drive up through front foot.
safety_tips: Keep torso upright and knee tracking over toes.
modifications: Bodyweight, holding DBs for resistance, using step forward variation.

name: Walking Lunge (Weighted)
description: Functional unilateral leg exercise that builds quad and glute strength and coordination.
setup_instructions: Stand tall holding dumbbells by sides.
execution_steps: Step forward, descend until both knees are 90°, push through front heel and step forward into next rep.
safety_tips: Control the step distance; avoid forward knee collapse.
modifications: Stationary lunges, reverse lunges, bodyweight.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Upper-chest focused pressing movement.
setup_instructions: Set bench at 20–35° incline, lie back and hold DBs at chest level.
execution_steps: Press up and slightly together; lower with control to chest.
safety_tips: Don’t go too steep lest shoulders become dominant.
modifications: Barbell incline bench, push-ups with feet elevated.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: Controlled horizontal pulling for mid-back thickness.
setup_instructions: Sit with knees slightly bent, feet braced; grab handle with neutral spine.
execution_steps: Pull handle to lower chest while squeezing shoulder blades together.
safety_tips: Avoid leaning back; use controlled tempo.
modifications: Single-arm DB row, chest-supported row.

name: Face Pull
description: Rear delt and upper-back developer; great for shoulder health.
muscle_groups: Rear Delts, Upper Back, Rotator Cuff
setup_instructions: Set rope at upper chest height on cable station and grab with neutral grip.
execution_steps: Pull rope towards face, elbows high, squeeze rear delts.
safety_tips: Use light-to-moderate load and full control; avoid heavy jerked reps.
modifications: Band face pulls, reverse flyes.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: Simple loaded carry to build grip, upper traps, core stability and conditioning.
setup_instructions: Pick two heavy dumbbells or farmer handles and stand tall.
execution_steps: Walk a planned distance keeping chest up and shoulders back.
safety_tips: Keep core braced and step with control.
modifications: Suitcase carry, single-arm farmer carry.

name: Plank (Forearm)
description: Isometric core stabilization exercise.
setup_instructions: Forearms on floor, elbows under shoulders, straight line head to heels.
execution_steps: Hold position for targeted time while bracing.
safety_tips: Avoid sagging hips; progress time gradually.
modifications: Side plank, elevated plank, dynamic plank variations.

name: Jump Rope (Basic)
description: High-efficiency cardio that improves coordination and conditioning.
setup_instructions: Stand tall with rope behind heels and elbows in by sides.
execution_steps: Rotate wrists and jump just high enough to clear rope.
safety_tips: Land softly and use good footwear on even surface.
modifications: Double-unders, alternate-foot hops.

name: Goblet Squat
description: Front-loaded squat that’s beginner friendly and builds quad/glute strength.
setup_instructions: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest with elbows tucked.
execution_steps: Descend to parallel while keeping chest up and drive through heels.
safety_tips: Keep torso upright; use a box for depth if needed.
modifications: Kettlebell goblet, bodyweight squat.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Machine-based vertical pull aimed at lats and upper back.
setup_instructions: Set thigh pads, sit tall and grab bar with wide grip.
execution_steps: Pull bar to upper chest while retracting shoulders.
safety_tips: Avoid leaning too far back and jerking the weight.
modifications: Assisted pull-up, single-arm lat pulldown.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift (Single-Leg)
description: Single-leg hamstring and balance developer.
setup_instructions: Stand on one leg holding a dumbbell in opposite hand.
execution_steps: Hinge at hip of standing leg, lower weight toward floor and return upright.
safety_tips: Control the tempo, maintain neutral spine.
modifications: Two-leg RDL, lighter loads.

name: Cable Triceps Pushdown
description: Isolation exercise for triceps mass and strength.
setup_instructions: Attach rope/straight bar to high pulley and stand upright.
execution_steps: Push down through elbows to full extension keeping elbows pinned.
safety_tips: Avoid shrugging shoulders; use controlled motion.
modifications: Overhead triceps extension, dips.

name: Cable Face Pull (Band alternative)
description: Scapular and rear-delt exercise for posture and shoulder health.
muscle_groups: Rear Delts, Upper Back, Rotator Cuff
setup_instructions: Set rope on cable at face height, step back and brace core.
execution_steps: Pull rope to face while keeping elbows high and squeezing rear delts.
safety_tips: Choose moderate loads and avoid momentum.
modifications: Band face pulls, reverse fly.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
description: Upper chest powerhouse movement often used to target clavicular fibers.
setup_instructions: Bench set at 20–35°, same setup as flat bench but angle changed.
execution_steps: Lower bar to upper chest and press to lockout.
safety_tips: Don’t over-arch back; control range of motion.
modifications: Incline dumbbell press.
